description: STRING No. 57 // From 2020-04-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // The RED lake series of paintings were painted in a rush the day before the lockdown in Denmark caused by Covid-19. The series has a feverish quality to it as if a dilution had temporarily occupied the mind and body of Jensen.
name: RED lake II/III
